name: Pineapple Statue
features: A prominent landmark symbolizing Sarikei's status as the 'Fruit Basket of Sarawak'. Popular photo spot.

name: Sarikei Central Market
features: Bustling market offering local produce, souvenirs, and snacks. Cultural and culinary hotspot.

name: Sarikei Lake Garden (Taman Tasik Sarikei)
features: Serene park with gardens, ponds, and recreational areas. Ideal for family outings and jogging.
address: Jalan Repok, approx. 1 km from Sarikei Town

name: Nyelong Esplanade
features: Scenic riverside promenade along Sungai Nyelong. Great for sunsets and boat watching.

name: Sebangkoi Country Park
features: Natural park with greenery, waterfalls, flora, and fauna. Excellent for nature walks and birdwatching.

name: Rumah Nyuka Longhouse
features: Traditional Iban longhouse experience with activities like fruit harvesting and rubber tapping.
address: 17 km from Bayong junction on Betong-Sarikei highway

name: Rajang River & Sarikei Jetty
features: Riverfront spot for boat rides, fishing, and observing local river life on Malaysia's longest river.

name: Pineapple Festival (Pesta Nanas)
features: Annual celebration of Sarikei's pineapple industry featuring competitions, food stalls, and performances.

name: Masjid Al-Muttaqin Sarikei
features: Prominent mosque known for its architecture and community role.

name: Sarikei Civic Centre
features: Venue for exhibitions, local events, and cultural activities.
address: Near King George VI Square, Sarikei
